name: Fall in Friends: An App to Transform Japan's Inbound Tourism for the Tokyo Olympics
description: Developed an application that allows foreign visitors in need to ask questions to Japanese people who want to help travelers.

video.name: Fall in Friends: An App to Transform Japan's Inbound Tourism for the Tokyo Olympics
video.description: Developed an application that allows foreign visitors in need to ask questions to Japanese people who want to help travelers.

educationalLevel: Primary and Secondary Education (Ages 17 and under)
